a:r.a:t: I do have a simple demo I want to show, but before we get to the demo…..
I do think this type of solution would complement other popular security solutions on the market that people are using today.

We know antivirus solutions do a great job of detecting and removing malwares, and malicious programs on people’s PCs and laptops, password managers do a fantastic job of helping you to secure those online accounts by making it easy for people to use secure passwords, and many cloud storage vendors have come out with the so-called personal vault or data vault to provide additional security for people’s most sensitive data.

But as far as we know, we don’t believe there are solutions out there that do a decent job of identify your sensitive PII data and document, and help you remove or secure those data, so they don’t, for whatever reasons, end up in the wrong hands of criminals.
